wisdom.sentence: A black cat crossing your path signifies that the animal is going somewhere.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: A friend of mine is into Voodoo Acupuncture.  You don't have to go. You'll just be walking down the street and...  Ooohh, that's much better.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me.  I'm afraid of widths.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: A possum must be himself, and being himself he is honest.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: "A power so great, it can only be used for Good or Evil!"
wisdom.author: Firesign Theatre, "The Giant Rat of Summatra"

wisdom.sentence: All men are mortal.  Socrates was mortal.  Therefore, all men are Socrates.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: And now for something completely different.
And now for something completely the same.
"Are you sure you're not an encyclopedia salesman?"  No, Ma'am.  Just a burglar, come to ransack the flat."
wisdom.author: Monty Python

wisdom.sentence: As the poet said, "Only God can make a tree" -- probably because it's so hard to figure out how to get the bark on.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: Being Ymor's right-hand man was like being gently flogged to death with scented bootlaces.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Colour of Magic"

wisdom.sentence: Bernard Shaw is an excellent man; he has not an enemy in the world, and none of his friends like him either.
wisdom.author: Oscar Wilde

wisdom.sentence: "Boy, life takes a long time to live."
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: "But I don't like Spam!!!!"
Comedy, like Medicine, was never meant to be practiced by the general public.
Death didn't answer.  He was looking at Spold in the same way as a dog looks at a bone, only in this case things were more or less the other way around.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Colour of Magic"

wisdom.sentence: Decorate your home.  It gives the illusion that your life is more interesting than it really is.
wisdom.author: C. Schulz

wisdom.sentence: Do you think that when they asked George Washington for ID that he just whipped out a quarter?
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Don't take life so serious, son, it ain't nohow permanent.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today.  It's already tomorrow in Australia.
wisdom.author: Charles Schulz

wisdom.sentence: Early to rise, early to bed, makes a man healthy, wealthy and dead.
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Light Fantastic"

wisdom.sentence: Eternal nothingness is fine if you happen to be dressed for it.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: Eternity is a terrible thought.  I mean, where's it going to end?
wisdom.author: Tom Stoppard

wisdom.sentence: Faster, faster, you fool, you fool!
wisdom.author: Bill Cosby

wisdom.sentence: For my birthday I got a humidifier and a de-humidifier...  I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: From the moment I picked your book up until I put it down I was convulsed with laughter. Some day I intend reading it.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx, from "The Book of Insults"

wisdom.sentence: God is a comic playing to an audience that's afraid to laugh.
He asked me if I knew what time it was -- I said yes, but not right now.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: "Here's something to think about:  How come you never see a headline like `Psychic Wins Lottery'?"
wisdom.author: Jay Leno

wisdom.sentence: Hey, what do you expect from a culture that *drives* on *parkways* and *parks* on *driveways*?
wisdom.author: Gallagher

wisdom.sentence: "Humor is a drug which it's the fashion to abuse."
wisdom.author: William Gilbert

wisdom.sentence: Humorists always sit at the children's table.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I am a conscientious man, when I throw rocks at seabirds I leave no tern unstoned.
wisdom.author: Ogden Nash, "Everybody's Mind to Me a Kingdom Is"

wisdom.sentence: I am two with nature.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: "I assure you the thought never even crossed my mind, lord."  "Indeed?  Then if I were you I'd sue my face for slander."
wisdom.author: Terry Pratchett, "The Colour of Magic"

wisdom.sentence: I base my fashion taste on what doesn't itch.
wisdom.author: Gilda Radner

wisdom.sentence: I bought some used paint. It was in the shape of a house.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: "I changed my headlights the other day. I put in strobe lights instead! Now when I drive at night, it looks like everyone else is standing still ..."
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I could dance with you till the cows come home.  On second thought, I'd rather dance with the cows till you come home.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: I don't deserve this award, but I have arthritis and I don't deserve that either.
wisdom.author: Jack Benny

wisdom.sentence: I don't get no respect.
I don't kill flies, but I like to mess with their minds.  I hold them above globes.  They freak out and yell "Whooa, I'm *way* too high."
wisdom.author: Bruce Baum

wisdom.sentence: I don't want to live on in my work, I want to live on in my apartment.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I finally went to the eye doctor.  I got contacts.  I only need them to read, so I got flip-ups.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I got this powdered water -- now I don't know what to add.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I had no shoes and I pitied myself.  Then I met a man who had no feet, so I took his shoes.
wisdom.author: Dave Barry

wisdom.sentence: I hate it when my foot falls asleep during the day cause that means it's going to be up all night.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I have a hobby.  I have the world's largest collection of sea shells.  I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world.  Maybe you've seen some of it.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I have a map of the United States.  It's actual size.  I spent last summer folding it.  People ask me where I live, and I say, "E6".
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I have a rock garden.  Last week three of them died.
wisdom.author: Richard Diran

wisdom.sentence: I have an existential map.  It has "You are here" written all over it.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I just got out of the hospital after a speed reading accident. I hit a bookmark.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I know the answer!  The answer lies within the heart of all mankind! The answer is twelve?  I think I'm in the wrong building.
wisdom.author: Charles Schulz

wisdom.sentence: I look at life as being cruise director on the Titanic.  I may not get there, but I'm going first class.
wisdom.author: Art Buchwald

wisdom.sentence: "I love Saturday morning cartoons, what classic humour!  This is what entertainment is all about ... Idiots, explosives and falling anvils."
wisdom.author: Calvin and Hobbes, Bill Watterson

wisdom.sentence: I met my latest girl friend in a department store.  She was looking at clothes, and I was putting Slinkys on the escalators.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I never forget a face, but in your case I'll make an exception.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: I poured spot remover on my dog.  Now he's gone.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I put contact lenses in my dog's eyes. They had little pictures of cats on them.  Then I took one out and he ran around in circles.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I put instant coffee in a microwave and almost went back in time.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I saw a subliminal advertising executive, but only for a second.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I should have been a country-western singer.  After all, I'm older than most western countries.
wisdom.author: George Burns

wisdom.sentence: I sold my memoirs of my love life to Parker Brothers -- they're going to make a game out of it.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I stayed up all night playing poker with tarot cards.  I got a full house and four people died.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I think we're all Bozos on this bus.
wisdom.author: Firesign Theatre

wisdom.sentence: I thought there was something fishy about the butler.  Probably a Pisces, working for scale.
wisdom.author: Firesign Theatre, "The Further Adventures of Nick Danger"

wisdom.sentence: I used to work in a fire hydrant factory.  You couldn't park anywhere near the place.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I was at this restaurant.  The sign said "Breakfast Anytime."  So I ordered French Toast in the Rennaissance.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I was in Vegas last week. I was at the roulette table, having a lengthy argument about what I considered an Odd number.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I was the best I ever had.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: "I went into a general store, and they wouldn't sell me anything specific".
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: "I went to the museum where they had all the heads and arms from the statues that are in all the other museums."
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I worked in a health food store once.  A guy came in and asked me, "If I melt dry ice, can I take a bath without getting wet?"
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: I'd horsewhip you if I had a horse.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: I'd never join any club that would have the likes of me as a member.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: I'll be comfortable on the couch.  Famous last words.
wisdom.author: Lenny Bruce

wisdom.sentence: I'm going to Boston to see my doctor.  He's a very sick man.
wisdom.author: Fred Allen

wisdom.sentence: I'm going to give my psychoanalyst one more year, then I'm going to Lourdes.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I'm going to live forever, or die trying!
wisdom.author: Spider Robinson

wisdom.sentence: I'm not afraid of death -- I just don't want to be there when it happens.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: I've had a perfectly wonderful evening.  But this wasn't it.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: If God had wanted us to be concerned for the plight of the toads, he would have made them cute and furry.
wisdom.author: Dave Barry

wisdom.sentence: If only Dionysus were alive!  Where would he eat?
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: If only God would give me some clear sign!  Like making a large deposit in my name at a Swiss bank.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Without Feathers"

wisdom.sentence: If you live to the age of a hundred you have it made because very few people die past the age of a hundred.
wisdom.author: George Burns

wisdom.sentence: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: If you've done six impossible things before breakfast, why not round it off with dinner at Milliway's, the restaurant at the end of the universe?
wisdom.author: Douglas Adams, "The Restaurant at the End of the Universe"

wisdom.sentence: In like a dimwit, out like a light.
wisdom.author: Pogo

wisdom.sentence: Is it weird in here, or is it just me?
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: It is impossible to experience one's death objectively and still carry a tune.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: It isn't necessary to have relatives in Kansas City in order to be unhappy.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: It looked like something resembling white marble, which was probably what it was: something resembling white marble.
wisdom.author: Douglas Adams, "The Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy"

wisdom.sentence: It's a small world, but I wouldn't want to have to paint it.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: It's hard to get ivory in Africa, but in Alabama the Tuscaloosa.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: It's not that I'm afraid to die. I just don't want to be there when it happens.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: Last night the power went out. Good thing my camera had a flash.... The neighbors thought it was lightning in my house, so they called the cops.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Life is divided into the horrible and the miserable.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Annie Hall"

wisdom.sentence: Life is wasted on the living.
wisdom.author: The Restaurant at the Edge of the Universe.

wisdom.sentence: My brother sent me a postcard the other day with this big satellite photo of the entire earth on it. On the back it said: "Wish you were here".
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: My friend has a baby.  I'm writing down all the noises he makes so later I can ask him what he meant.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Nietzsche says that we will live the same life, over and over again. God -- I'll have to sit through the Ice Capades again.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Hannah and Her Sisters"

wisdom.sentence: Nirvana?  That's the place where the powers that be and their friends hang out.
wisdom.author: Zonker Harris

wisdom.sentence: NOBODY EXPECTS THE SPANISH INQUISITION!
Now is the time for all good men to come to.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: One doesn't have a sense of humor.  It has you.
wisdom.author: Larry Gelbart

wisdom.sentence: Outside of a dog, a book is a man's best friend.  Inside a dog it's too dark to read.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx

wisdom.sentence: "Right now I'm having amnesia and deja vu at the same time."
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Romeo wasn't bilked in a day.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly, "Ten Ever-Lovin' Blue-Eyed Years With Pogo"

wisdom.sentence: Showing up is 80
of life.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen

wisdom.sentence: Thank goodness modern convenience is a thing of the remote future.
wisdom.author: Pogo, by Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: The best cure for insomnia is to get a lot of sleep.
wisdom.author: W. C. Fields

wisdom.sentence: The best way to make a fire with two sticks is to make sure one of them is a match.
wisdom.author: Will Rogers

wisdom.sentence: The grand leap of the whale up the Fall of Niagara is esteemed, by all who have seen it, as one of the finest spectacles in nature.
wisdom.author: Benjamin Franklin.

wisdom.sentence: The other day I... uh, no, that wasn't me.
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: There comes a time in the affairs of a man when he has to take the bull by the tail and face the situation.
wisdom.author: W.C. Fields

wisdom.sentence: There's no easy quick way out, we're gonna have to live through our whole lives, win, lose, or draw.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: There's so much plastic in this culture that vinyl leopard skin is becoming an endangered synthetic.
wisdom.author: Lily Tomlin

wisdom.sentence: Things will get better despite our efforts to improve them.
wisdom.author: Will Rogers

wisdom.sentence: Time is an illusion, lunchtime doubly so.
wisdom.author: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

wisdom.sentence: TOO BAD YOU CAN'T BUY a voodoo globe so that you could make the earth spin real fast and freak everybody out.
wisdom.author: Jack Handley, The New Mexican, 1988.

wisdom.sentence: Twenty Percent of Zero is Better than Nothing.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: We have met the enemy, and he is us.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly

wisdom.sentence: We is confronted with insurmountable opportunities.
wisdom.author: Walt Kelly, "Pogo"

wisdom.sentence: What if everything is an illusion and nothing exists?  In that case, I definitely overpaid for my carpet.
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Without Feathers"

wisdom.sentence: What if nothing exists and we're all in somebody's dream?  Or what's worse, what if only that fat guy in the third row exists?
wisdom.author: Woody Allen, "Without Feathers"

wisdom.sentence: What is comedy?  Comedy is the art of making people laugh without making them puke.
wisdom.author: Steve Martin

wisdom.sentence: What's another word for "thesaurus"?
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: When I was crossing the border into Canada, they asked if I had any firearms with me.  I said, "Well, what do you need?"
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: When I was little, I went into a pet shop and they asked how big I'd get.
wisdom.author: Rodney Dangerfield

wisdom.sentence: When I woke up this morning, my girlfriend asked if I had slept well. I said, "No, I made a few mistakes."
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Where humor is concerned there are no standards -- no one can say what is good or bad, although you can be sure that everyone will.
wisdom.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

wisdom.sentence: Why is the alphabet in that order?  Is it because of that song?
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: Will Rogers never met you.
Would you *really* want to get on a non-stop flight?
wisdom.author: George Carlin

wisdom.sentence: You can't have everything.  Where would you put it?
wisdom.author: Steven Wright

wisdom.sentence: You may already be a loser.
wisdom.author: Form letter received by Rodney Dangerfield.

wisdom.sentence: You'd better beat it.  You can leave in a taxi.  If you can't get a taxi, you can leave in a huff.  If that's too soon, you can leave in a minute and a huff.
wisdom.author: Groucho Marx
